itemDesc: A timed fragmentation grenade designed for anti-infantry use, dispersing lethal shrapnel in a wide radius.
A stick-style fragmentation grenade designed to be thrown over medium distances. Always causes bleeding to infantry targets.
A chemical grenade that releases toxic gas, dealing damage over time to unprotected infantry within its area of effect.
A non-lethal grenade that produces a thick smoke cloud, used to obscure vision and provide cover for troop movements.
An incendiary anti-armor grenade designed to melt vehicle armor and disable subsystems on impact.
An adhesive anti-tank grenade designed to stick to armored vehicles and penetrate heavy armor upon detonation.
A rifle-launched grenade used for indirect fire against infantry and light structures.
A heavy improvised explosive grenade designed to deal significant damage to structures and vehicles at close range.
